Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.model.board

Class ClientPlayground

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.model.board.ClientPlayground
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientPlayground extends Object implements Serializable
Representation of the player's playground.

    • getAllPositions

      public Set<Position> getAllPositions()
      Returns all the position in the playground.
      Returns:

    • getRange

      public int[] getRange()
      Returns the maximum x and the maximum y in absolute value of the tiles' position in the playground.
      Returns:
      an array where the first index is the maximum x and the second one is the maximum y.
